item.title: From ProGAN to StyleGAN
item.description: In this post, we are looking into two high-resolution image generation models: ProGAN and StyleGAN. They generates the artificial images gradually, starting from a very low resolution and continuing to a high resolution (finally $1024\times 1024$).
